greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the asymptotic mean value of the exponential abundancy index A051377(k)/k.
comment: Lim_{n->oo} (1/n) * Sum_{k=1..n} esigma(k)/k, where esigma(k) is the sum of exponential divisors of k (A051377).
link: Peter Hagis, Jr., Some results concerning exponential divisors, International Journal of Mathematics and Mathematical Sciences, Vol. 11, No. 2, (1988), pp. 343-349.
results.author: _Amiram Eldar_, Dec 29 2018
